Info

Defines class YamlBase with attribute(s) and method(s). Loads ATS information/configuration, setup ATS CL interface.

class ats_utilities.config_io.yaml.YamlBase(information_file: str | None, verbose: bool = False)[source]¶

Bases: object

Defines class YamlBase with attribute(s) and method(s). Loads ATS information/configuration, setup ATS CL interface. Configuration base YAML API support.

It defines:

attributes:
_verbose - Enable/Disable verbose option.
tool_operational - Control ATS operational functionality.
yaml2obj - In API for information.
obj2yaml - Out API for information.
option_parser - Option parser for ATS.
methods:
__init__ - Initial YamlBase constructor.
is_tool_ok - Check is tool operational.
_verbose: bool¶
is_tool_ok() → bool[source]¶

Check is tool operational.

Returns:

True (tool is operational) | False

Return type:

<bool>

Exceptions:

None

obj2yaml: Object2Yaml¶
option_parser: ATSOptionParser¶
tool_operational: bool¶
verbose = 'ATS_UTILITIES'¶
yaml2obj: Yaml2Object¶
